ai-mil7.8.6:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the three factors should be called by one a dragon?”
ai-mil7.8.6:1.2_0: “Just as, Great King, for all the stiffened food and drink
ai-mil7.8.6:1.3_0: In the same way, although roaming all the roads to all identifying, you should be constantly prevented by all paths.
ai-mil7.8.6:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the power of all the hards grow.
ai-mil7.8.6:2.2_0: In the same way, a meditator who is engaged in all kinds of merit for growing.
ai-mil7.8.6:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, a mendicant is satisfied by all foods.
ai-mil7.8.6:3.2_0: In the same way, although you may all engage in all ways.
ai-mil7.8.6:3.3_0: This is the third kind of food.
ai-mil7.8.6:4.2_0: Reviewing the path for realizing it,
ai-mil7.8.6:5.1_0: The sixth enquiry is the sixth thing.
